data.title: The Carolyn Jackson Collection, no. 10
data.meta_description: Austin television personality Carolyn Jackson interviews actress Barbara Hershey about her role in The Last Hard Men. Hershey describes her career path, her love of acting and how it helps her learn about herself as a person. She also speaks about her young son and how she spends her time when not working.
data.meta_site_name: The Film and Video Archive of Texas
